title: AI is already upending the US job market as predictions of a 'jobs apocalypse' multiply

title: New China reform aims to improve social protection for employees
subhead: Since a new judicial interpretation by the Supreme People's Court came into effect on September 1, employers have been required to pay social security contributions, even if there is no formal contract in place.

title: Turkish community in northwest Germany tempted by far-right AfD party
subhead: While Turkish immigrants in the Marxloh neighborhood of Duisburg had until now mostly voted for the Social Democratic party (SPD, center-left), they have gradually been drawn to the anti-immigration and conservative rhetoric of the far right.

title: Dominique Pelicot, a useless witness at the appeal trial
subhead: The orchestrator of Gisèle Pelicot's rapes testified Tuesday against the sole defendant to have appealed, Husamettin Dogan. But how much significance should be given to the testimony of a man who has lied so much?

title: Why foreigners love France but struggle with the French
subhead: While France captivates with its culture and lifestyle, the French, frequently caricatured as arrogant and impolite, often have a poor reputation. This ambivalence raises questions about the roots of anti-French sentiment abroad.
